scripts.build: pnpm rm:dist && pnpm rollup -c && pnpm build-css-modules
scripts.build-css-modules: node ./scripts/color-tokens.js && node ./scripts/color-roles-css.js && node ./scripts/color-css.js && node ./scripts/semantic-css.js && node ./scripts/cursor-css.js && node ./scripts/scaling-css.js && node ./scripts/space-css.js && node ./scripts/radius-css.js && node ./scripts/typography-css.js && node ./scripts/shadow-css.js && node ./scripts/base-css.js &&  node ./scripts/generate-index-css.js
